title: Session 5: TBC
description: We don't have a speaker for this session yet!
contents: We don’t have a topic for this session yet! Would you like to present something, or request a topic? Get in touch!

title: Session 4: visualising your literature review
description: Visualise results from your literature review.
contents:
In this session, Ayu Dewi will give a live demonstration of how to create visualisations that summarise the results of your literature review.
Want to attend or present? Get in touch!

title: Session 3: making maps
contents:
In this session, we will give an introduction to geographic data and mapping using sf.
Want to attend or present? Get in touch!

title: Session 2: data visualisation
description: Introduction to data visualisation using ggplot2.
contents:
In this session, we will give an introduction to data visualisation using ggplot2 via a live coding demonstration.
You can view my prep script here, and the script used in the demonstration itself is available here.
Want to attend or present? Get in touch!

title: Session 1: tidytuesday
description: First session to kick-off the group & a short demonstration of tidytuesday.
contents:
In this session, we kick-off the R user meeting for Amsterdam UMC (RUM-UMC) with personal introductions, a conversation to find out people’s preferences for format and timings (e.g., frequency of meets, hybrid), followed by a brief demonstration of tidytuesday.
You can find the script used during the session here.
